code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL='http://localhost:8000/api/tasks';export const getTasks=async()=>{const response=await axios.get(API_URL);return response.data;};export const createTask=async task=>{const response=await axios.post(API_URL,task);return response.data;};export const updateTaskStatus=async(taskId,status)=>{const response=await axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(taskId),{status});return response.data;};export const deleteTask=async taskId=>{const response=await axios.delete("".concat(API_URL,"/").concat(taskId));return response.data;};
